mapper.update: update t_violent_info set behavior = #{behavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuId = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vioContent = #{vioContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, violentLevel = #{violentLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regsterTime = #{regsterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, behavior, stuId, vioContent, violentLevel, regsterTime from t_violent_info
